scene.name: intro
scene.line: I'd say that's enough about `` to last an evening, huh?
scene.option: I'm sure you've heard it all before.

scene.name: never-stop
scene.line: Not as long as someone's listening.

scene.name: harmless
scene.line: Harmless is a good word for it.

scene.name: heard-before
scene.line: That's his latest rant. But I'm not surprised by anything anymore. Before this it was bovine growth hormones and global warming ...

scene.name: dawn-personal-question
scene.line: I come here just about every night, so I know `you` don't. What do you think of our adopted home?
scene.option: Kind of sleepy. Or maybe it's just late.

scene.name: beach
scene.line: Sometimes when I need to come down a little, I kick my shoes off and walk in the sand. You'd be amazed what your toes turn up!
One time I found ... it was ... that's odd. I forgot what I was going to say.

scene.name: sleepy
scene.line: I guess it is late. I don't sleep much anymore, and neither does Sonny. I forget when that started exactly ... We just started coming here instead of going to bed.

scene.name: drinks
scene.line: It's all true, though you wouldn't know it to taste them. I always say it's the pineapple juice. You could hide the taste of motor oil with pineapple juice. Ha ha.
All that sugar goes straight to your head and you forget the burning in your gut.
